common.ifYouNeedHelp: If you need help, please contact our {technicalSupport}.

errorCode.logout: Your account has been logged out. Please log in again.
errorCode.-1: Unexpected Exception, please try again later.
errorCode.-2: Unexpected Exception, please try again later.
errorCode.-4: Unexpected Exception, please try again later.
errorCode.-6: User accounts need to be merged.
errorCode.-21: Unexpected Exception, please try again later.
errorCode.-3020: Failed to register the TP-Link ID.
errorCode.-3041: Failed to get the Service Region information.
errorCode.-3064: The new password cannot be the same as the old password.
errorCode.-3069: The country/region code does not exist.
errorCode.-3087: Invalid client ID or redirect URL.
errorCode.-10000: Unexpected Exception, please try again later.
errorCode.-10015: Unexpected Exception, please try again later.
errorCode.-11000: Avatar file name is too long.
errorCode.-11001: Avatar file size is too large.
errorCode.-11002: Failed to save the avatar file. Please try again later.
errorCode.-11021: Please wait 60 seconds, then the system can send a reset password email.
errorCode.-19999: The service is unavailable in the country/region to which this account belongs. Please contact our technical support.
errorCode.-20301: Failed to get the encoder URL.
errorCode.-20601: Incorrect TP-Link ID or password. Please try again.
errorCode.-20602: This account has not been activated.
errorCode.-20654: A verified organization cannot be edited.
errorCode.-20679: The token is invalid or has expired.
errorCode.-20681: MFA process does not exist or has expired.
errorCode.-20684: The number of verification code errors exceeds the limit.
errorCode.-40000: The organization is duplicate in this region.
errorCode.-40001: The number of organizations number exceeds the limit of a single account.
errorCode.-40003: The organization business license file cannot be larger than 5 MB.
errorCode.-40004: Failed to save the business license file.
errorCode.-40005: The organization role has insufficient permissions.
errorCode.-40006: Cannot apply to join an unverified organization.
errorCode.-40007: The user is already in the organization.
errorCode.-40008: The user is already in an applying process of this organization.
errorCode.-40009: The apply record does not exist.
errorCode.-40010: Operation failed because another user is operating this organization. Please try again later.
errorCode.-40011: This user has already been invited.
errorCode.-40012: The invitation code has expired or is invalid.
errorCode.-40013: Invitation is too frequent, please wait one minute before inviting again.
errorCode.-40014: Cannot invite users of other regions.
errorCode.-40015: Failed to send the invitation email.
errorCode.-40016: You used to invite this user. Invite again in the member list if needed.
errorCode.-40018: Cannot join the organization since it is not in your region.
errorCode.-40020: The number of invitations to the user exceeds the limit of a day.
errorCode.-40021: The previous invitation has not expired. Please invite 7 days after the last invitation
errorCode.-40022: The number of invitations of the organization exceeds the limit of a day.
errorCode.-40024: Cannot invite the user who has conflicted account information.
errorCode.-40025: The user has conflicted account information and cannot join a new company.
errorCode.-40026: The user has conflicted account information and cannot create a new company.
errorCode.-40027: The Business License file name should be less than 256 characters.

operation.dragUpload: Drag and drop a file or click here to upload
operation.dragUploadTip: Upload a file within 5 MB. If you have multiple files, compress them into a package to upload. Do Not upload company data or other brand files!

region.SOUTH_GEORGIA_AND_THE_SOUTH_SANDWICH_ISL: South Georgia and the South Sandwich Islands

vtypes.ASCII_VISIBLE: This field should be visible ASCII.
vtypes.ASCII_VISIBLE_ALLOW_BLANK: This field should be visible ASCII or space.
vtypes.CONTAINS_TWO: The password should be a combination of letters, numbers, or symbols.
vtypes.ILLEGAL_CHAR: The value cannot contain the following characters "'\;:<@
vtypes.NAME: Invalid format.
vtypes.NUMBER_MIN: This number should be no less than {min}.
vtypes.NUMBER_MAX: This number should be no more than {max}.
vtypes.NUMBER_MIN_MAX: Enter a number ranges from {min} to {max}.
vtypes.LEN_MIN: This length should be no less than {min}.
vtypes.LEN_MAX: This length should be no more than {max}.
vtypes.LEN_MIN_MAX: Enter a value ranges from {min} to {max} characters.
vtypes.STRING_INCLUDE_SPACE: Invalid format. Only letters, numbers, spaces, and the following symbols are allowed: - . / : @ _
vtypes.FILE_SIZE_ERROR: The size of file has exceeded the limit. It should be less than {fileSize}.
vtypes.INVALID_DOMAIN: This field should start with http:// or https://, followed by the IPv4 address or domain.
vtypes.INCORRECT_NAME_PWD: Incorrect TP-Link ID or password. Please try again.
vtypes.FILE_NAME_LEN_MAX: The file name should be less than {max} characters.
vtypes.ILLEGAL_EMAIL_END: Email address cannot end with {'@'}tplink.id and {'@'}mercusys.id.

login.regionSelectTip: The Country/Region cannot be changed once it is applied.
login.dataStoreTip: Your user data will be stored in {region}.
login.subscriptionNote: Please keep me updated with my TP-Link product updates and promotions via email.
login.terms: I accept the {termsOfUse} and confirm that I have fully read and understood the {privacyPolicy}.
login.termsRequiredTip: Please read and accept the Terms of Use.
login.registerEmailSend: An activation email has been sent to {email}
login.registerEmailTip: Please follow the instructions in the email to activate your TP-Link ID.
login.resetEmailSend: A password reset email has been sent to {email}
login.resetEmailTip: Please follow the instructions in the email to reset your password.
login.noEmailTip: No email from TP-Link? Please check your Junk or Spam folder, or resend the email.
login.mfaNoEmailTip: No email from {system}? Please check your Junk or Spam folder, or resend the email.
login.resetTip: Send an Email to reset your password.
login.accountLockedTipM: The number of failed login attempts of this account is up to limit. The account will be locked for {minutes} minutes, please try again later or reset your password.
login.accountLockedTipH: The number of failed login attempts of this account is up to limit. The account will be locked for {hours} hours, please try again later or reset your password.
login.accountLockedTipHM: The number of failed login attempts of this account is up to limit. The account will be locked for {hours} hours {minutes} minutes, please try again later or reset your password.
login.lockTipM: You have entered an incorrect TP-Link ID or password for {count} times in a row. If you enter it incorrectly again, the account will be locked for {minutes} minutes.
login.lockTipH: You have entered an incorrect TP-Link ID or password for {count} times in a row. If you enter it incorrectly again, the account will be locked for {hours} hours.
login.lockTipHM: You have entered an incorrect TP-Link ID or password for {count} times in a row. If you enter it incorrectly again, the account will be locked for {hours} hours {minutes} minutes.
login.confirmRegionTip: To provide better experience, please select your country or region, and it cannot be changed once applied.
login.failSendResetEmailTip: Cannot send the password reset email to an unmerged account.
login.inviteRegisterTip: The invited email address is not registered. Please register first.
login.copyright: Copyright © {year} TP-Link Systems Inc. All rights reserved.
login.signOutTip: Are you sure you want to sign out?
login.inviteActivationTip: Click the "Registration Complete" button after activation is complete.
login.ppUpdateTip: We have updated our Privacy Policy to better protect your personal information. Please take a few minutes to read the {newPp} to understand how we collect, use, and protect your data.If you have any questions or need further information, please feel free to contact our support team. Thank you for your understanding and cooperation!

profile.title: Profile
profile.name: Name
profile.dragUploadPicture: Drag and drop a picture or click here to upload.
profile.dragUploadPictureTip: PNG and JPG images supported (max 1 MB).

security.lock: Click here to lock Security settings
security.unLock: Click here to unlock Security settings
security.lockTip: Enter your account password to unlock settings.
security.resetEmailTip: A password reset email has been sent to {email}
security.emailDetail: Receive an email with an authentication code
security.appInputDetail: Your six-digit code can be found in your primary authentication app.
security.mfaDeleteDetail: You will no longer be able to authenticate login requests using this method.
security.mfaCloseDetail: You will no longer be able to use 2FA.
security.mfaTip: With Two-factor authentication (2FA) enabled, you'll need both a password login and a 6-digit token automatically generated by App or Email authentication. This provides a much higher level of security.
security.mfaAppError: Failed to load the QR code.
security.mfaAppTip1: Download the Authenticator App on your phone.
security.mfaAppTip2: Scan the QR code using Authenticator App, and enter the 6-digit token to enable 2FA.
security.mfaEmailTip: Your six-digit code was sent to {email}
security.newPasswordError: The new password cannot be the same as the original password
security.clearDetail: All sessions except the current device session will be cleared.
security.chooseTip: Select how you would like to authenticate your account access. If you lose access to all of your authentication methods, please contact our {technicalSupport}.
security.accountLockTipM: The account will be locked for {minutes} minutes due to excessive failed attempts. Please try again later or reset your password.
security.accountLockTipH: The account will be locked for {hours} hours due to excessive failed attempts. Please try again later or reset your password.
security.accountLockTipHM: The account will be locked for {hours} hours {minutes} minutes due to excessive failed attempts. Please try again later or reset your password.
security.lockTipM: Incorrect password. Five consecutive failures will lock the account for {minutes} minutes. Remaining attempts: {count}.
security.lockTipH: Incorrect password. Five consecutive failures will lock the account for {hours} hours. Remaining attempts: {count}.
security.lockTipHM: Incorrect password. Five consecutive failures will lock the account for {hours} hours {minutes} minutes. Remaining attempts: {count}.
security.ineffectiveCodeTip: Invalid verification code. Please resend the code.
security.exceedLimitCodeTip: Your account is temporarily locked due to multiple failed attempts. Please try again in 10 minutes.
security.toptSecretExpiredTip: 2FA session timeout. Please close the pop-up window and try again.
security.forceEnable2FATip: App Authentication must be configured before Email Authentication. If your Omada/VIGI services or apps use older versions and do not support Email Authentication, log in with App Authentication.
security.deleteMFATips: After 2FA integration, App authentication cannot be removed before Email authentication. Please set App authentication as the primary authentication method and remove Email authentication.

company.name: Company Name
company.organizationCodeTip: Note: This is a number assigned by local government agencies to identify a business within the local market. Example codes include the VAT Number in Europe, the Siret Number in France, the Company Number in Australia, and the State Registry Number in Brazil.
company.applicationTip: Wait for approval from the company administrator.
company.unauditedMessage: There are {num} member applications to review.
company.resendEmailMessage: Are you sure you want to resend the invitation email?
company.deleteMemberMessage: Are you sure you want to delete the member?
company.acceptMessage: This TP-Link ID will join your company.
company.rejectMessage: This TP-Link ID will be rejected to join your company.
company.processingDescription: You will receive an email to join the organization once the review is successful.
company.rejectedDescription: The management has already denied your application. If you have any questions, please contact the management staff.
company.revocateConfirmTitle: Are you sure you want to withdraw your application?
company.revocateConfirmMessage: This will undo your previous changes and cannot be reversed.

invite.title: You've been invited to join {company}
invite.invalidTip: The invitation has expired or is invalid. Please contact the inviter.

migrateAccounts.migrateLocalAccount: Migrate Local Account to TP-Link ID
migrateAccounts.description: For better account services, your {email} account will be migrated to TP-Link ID. This change will not affect your business operations or the security of your account.
migrateAccounts.ppAndPa: Your email has been registered in different TP-Link business systems but there are discrepancies. Please confirm and merge account details so you can access all TP-Link business systems with a single unified account.
migrateAccounts.failedToRegister: Failed to Register the TP-Link ID
migrateAccounts.pleaseReSignIn: Please re-sign in and try again.
migrateAccounts.oldPasswordIncorrect: Incorrect old password of TP-Link ID.

twoFAAccounts.subsequentLogin: Omada Cloud Service has successfully integrated with the TP-Link ID system. Please select an account to use its two-factor authentication (2FA) method for login:
twoFAAccounts.disabled2FADescription: You can re-enable 2FA on the Account management page after disabling it.
twoFAAccounts.confirmText: The account you selected is using email authentication for 2FA. To log in normally, ensure your system meets the following version requirements: Controller xxx or above, Omada app xxx or above, Omada Guard app xxx or above, and Local VMS xxx or above.
twoFAAccounts.chooseOmadaText: If you have not upgraded to the above versions, select { cloudService }.
twoFAAccounts.uidEmailOnlyText: Omada Cloud Service has successfully integrated with the TP-Link ID system. Since the TP-Link ID system no longer supports Email Authentication and uses a different 2FA method, please disable 2FA before continuing.If needed, you can enable 2FA and configure App Authentication later in account settings.

TIMEZONE.AMERICA_LA_PAZ: Georgetown, La Paz, Manaus, San Juan
TIMEZONE.EUROPE_AMSTERDAM: Amsterdam, Berlin, Bern, Rome, Stockholm, Vienna
TIMEZONE.EUROPE_VILNIUS: Helsinki, Kaliningrad, Kyiv, Riga, Sofia, Tallinn, Vilnius

backend.variousSystem: As a member of this organization, you'll have access to various TP-Link business systems and services.
backend.acceptInvitaionTips: To accept this invitation, please click the button below:
backend.expireInvitaion: This invitation link will expire in 7 days.
backend.contactSender: If you have any questions or if you believe this invitation was sent in error, please contact the sender directly.
backend.joinOrganization: {user} invites you to join their organization
